General.Name: Tres Or Resources Ltd
General.Description: Tres-Or Resources Ltd., a resource company, engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, diamond, and base metal properties. Its flagship project is Quebec Diamond project located in Témiscamingue region in southwestern, Quebec. Tres-Or Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1934 - 131 Street White Rock, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V4A 7R7
